member.name: F:Step1.SimpleOptionParser.args
member.summary: The command line arguments to be parsed.

member.name: F:Step1.SimpleOptionParser.iarg
member.summary: Current position in the command line arguments list.

member.name: M:Step1.SimpleOptionParser.GetOption
member.summary: Get the next option/argument pair from the command line.
member.returns: Returns True if an argument was successfully parsed. If True is returned, then the Option property contains the parsed option, and the Argument property contains the parsed option. Returns False on error or end of options. If end of options is reached, Eof is set to True. If Eof is False, then the Error property contains the error.

member.name: M:Step1.SimpleOptionParser.ParseOptions(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Parses the array of options definitions to create internal list of OptionDef objects.
member.returns: A list of OptionDef structures that are used by the GetOption method.

member.name: P:Step1.SimpleOptionParser.OptionChar
member.summary: The character used to identify options.

member.name: P:Step1.SimpleOptionParser.Option
member.summary: The most recent option parsed by GetOption.

member.name: P:Step1.SimpleOptionParser.Argument
member.summary: The Argument (in any) associated with the most recent option.

member.name: P:Step1.SimpleOptionParser.Error
member.summary: Error message generated if GetOpt returns false.

member.name: P:Step1.SimpleOptionParser.Eof
member.summary: End of file flag set when all options are exhausted
